name: EAGLE Design Rules
summary: Learn about .DRU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Autodesk EAGLE was formerly known as CadSoft EAGLE. The software was acquired by Autodesk in 2016. EAGLE stands for "Easily Applicable Graphical Layout Editor."

description: A DRU file contains design rules created by CadSoft EAGLE, an application used for designing Printed Circuit Boards (PCB). It stores design rules for manufacturing a PCB and includes settings for layers, distances, size, shapes, masks, and clearance.
